description: A cienaCesPortXcvrRemovedNotification is sent if the transceiver has been removed.
To enable the device to send this notification: cienaCesPortXcvrLinkStateChangeTrapState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState, and cienaCesPortAllTrapState need to be set to
enabled. These objects are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex, and
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber.

event.Summary: Transceiver has been removed on port $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrRemovedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber u 1

variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Indicates the chassis index for the port used for trap definition.

description: Indicates the port number for the corresponding PGID
used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber

description: A cienaCesPortXcvrInsertedNotification is sent if the transceiver has been inserted. To
enable the device to send this notification: cienaCesPortXcvrLinkStateChangeTrapState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState, and cienaCesPortAllTrapState need to be set to
enabled. These objects are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex, and
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber.

event.Summary: Transceiver has been inserted on port $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrInsertedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber u 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Indicates the chassis index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex

description: A cienaCesPortXcvrErrorTypeNotification is sent if the transceiver is detected to be faulted.
The reason for the failure is specified by cienaCesPortXcvrErrorType. To enable the device to
send this notification: cienaCesPortXcvrErrorTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState
and cienaCesPortAllTrapState need to be set to enabled. These objects are enabled by default.
Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber, and cienaCesPortXcvrErrorType.

event.Summary: Transceiver fault on port $v6 : $v7

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrErrorTypeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrErrorType i 1

variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber

description: Indicates if the transceiver specified by the cienaCesPortXcvrId is faulted because of
checksum failure or optical fault. This object only makes sense if the transceiver has
been detected faulted; otherwise it returns 'none'.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrErrorType

description: A cienaCesPortXcvrTempHighNotification is sent if the transceiver temperature exceeds the
threshold. To enable the device to send this notification: cienaCesPortXcvrTempChangeTrapState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState, and cienaCesPortAllTrapState need to be set to enabled.
These objects are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex, and cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber.

variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex

description: Indicates the shelf index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex

description: Indicates the slot index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex

description: Indicates the port number for the corresponding PGID
used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber

description: A cienaCesPortXcvrTxPowerHighNotification is sent if the transceiver TxPower exceeds the
threshold. To enable the device to send this notification: cienaCesPortXcvrTxPowerChangeTrapState
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState, and cienaCesPortAllTrapState need to be set to enabled.
These objects are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex, and cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber.

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrTxPowerHighNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 4 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber u 1

description: A cienaCesPortXcvrSpeedInfoMissingNotification is sent if the transceiver speed
information is not found. To enable the device to send this notification:
cienaCesPortXcvrSpeedInfoTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState, and
cienaCesPortAllTrapState need to be set to enabled. These objects are set to enabled
by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex, and cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber.

event.Summary: Transceiver speed information is missing on port $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrSpeedInfoMissingNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 6 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber u 1

variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber

description: A cienaCesPortXcvrUncertifiedNotification is sent if the transceiver is not
certified for use by Ciena. To enable the device to send this notification:
cienaCesPortXcvrUncertifiedTrapState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState,
and cesPortAllTrapState need to be set to enabled. cienaCesPortXcvrUncertifiedTrapState
is set to disabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex, and cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber.

event.Summary: Transceiver on port $v6 is not certified

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrUncertifiedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber u 1

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrTxPowerLowWarningNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber u 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Indicates the chassis index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifChassisIndex

description: Indicates the shelf index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifShelfIndex

description: Indicates the slot index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifSlotIndex

description: Indicates the port number for the corresponding PGID
used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-XCVR-MIB::cienaCesPortXcvrNotifPortNumber
